question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. score board
B. pepsi ad board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The score board is visibly farther away than the Pepsi ad board, as it is positioned behind the ad board in the background of the image, and the ad board is closer to the foreground.
